subject: Photography
title: Famous Photo Manipulations
description: A fast breakdown of Famous Photo Manipulations for builders.

hook.text: Stalin erased political enemies from photographs. Manipulated images predate Photoshop by a century.

buildup.text: Photo manipulation dates to the 1860s ‚Äî compositing, retouching, and airbrushing for political and commercial gain.

discovery.text: Stalin's regime systematically removed purged officials from historical photographs to rewrite history.

twist.text: Digital tools made manipulation effortless. Now anyone with a phone can alter images that millions will believe.

climax.text: From Stalin to social media, the impulse to manipulate photos reveals a timeless desire to control the visual record.

punchline.text: If you can change the photo, you can change the story.

quiz.question: How did Stalin use photo manipulation?
options: He erased purged political enemies from official photographs to rewrite history
He added himself to famous paintings
He only used black and white film
